column2: "Nna nkɔnhyɛnyi Elisha frɛɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no mu baako na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Bɔ w'asen do
column4: na fa ngotoaba yi kitsa wo nsamu
column5: na kɔ Ramot-gilead."

column2: "Na sɛ idu hɔ a
column3: hwehwɛ Nimsi ba Jehosafat ne ba Jehu wɔ hɔ
column5: na ma ɔnsoɛr mfi no nuanom mu
column6: na fa no kɔ mpiakyir pia mu."

column2: "Na nkyii fa ngotoaba no
column3: na hue gu n'etsifi
column5: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column6: Masera wo mahyɛ wo Israel do hen. Na afei bue abow no

column2: "Nna aberantsɛ no
column3: mekyerɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi aberantsɛ no

column2: "Na aber a odurii no
column3: nna
column5: dɔm do asafohemfo no tsetse hɔ; na ɔsee dɛ
column7: mowɔ nkra bi dze ma wo. Na Jehu see dɛ
column8: Edze ma hɛn nyinara mu woana? Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsoɛree
column3: na ɔkɔr dan no mu; na ohuee ngo no guu n'etsifi
column5: Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column8: Masera wo mahyɛ wo EWURADZE ne man do hen

column2: "Na ɔwo bɔbɔ wo wura Ahab ne fie
column3: ma meedzi mo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn bɔgyaa
column4: na EWURADZE no nkowaa no nyinara hɔn bɔgyaa ho wer wɔ Jezebel nsamu."

column2: "Osiandɛ Ahab fi nyina bɛsɛɛ: na mubotwa Ahab mu abofra ɔbanyin biara akyen
column3: na Israel mu nyia ɔdze no ho mu na nyia ɔnndze no ho."

column2: "Na mebɛyɛ Ahab fi dɛ Nebat ne ba Jeroboam fi
column3: na dɛ Ahija ne ba Baasha fi."

column2: "Na nkraman bedzi Jezebel ne nam wɔ Jezreel asaase do
column3: na obi nnyi hɔ a obesie no. Na obuee abow no

column2: "Nna Jehu fiir edzi baa no wura no nkowaa no nkyɛn: na obi see no dɛ
column3: Asomdwee mu anaa? Ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔbɔdamfo yi ba wo nkyɛn yi? Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Homara hom nyim ɔbarimba no na mbrɛ ne nsɛnkekaa tse."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Akɔhwi a; ka kyerɛ hɛn ɛ. Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Dɛm na dɛm nna ɔkaa kyerɛɛ me
column5: dɛ
column7: Masera wo mahyɛ wo Israel do hen."

column2: "Nna wɔyɛɛ ntsɛm yiyii hɔn ntar dze hyehyɛɛ n'ase wɔ atwer no no ara do
column3: na wɔhɛɛn abɛn
column5: Jehu dzi hen."

column2: "Dɛm na Nimsi ba Jehosafat ne ba Jehu paam Joram ne tsir do. (Afei nna Joram
column3: noara na Israel nyinara
column5: osian Siriahen Hazael ntsi:"

column2: "na ɔhen Joram dze
column3: ɔasan aba Jezreel dɛ ɔrebɛyɛ n'epirakur a
column4: aber a ɔnye Siriahen Hazael roko no
column5: opirae no edur.) Na Jehu see dɛ
column6: Sɛ hom adwen nye yi a
column7: ɔno mma hom mma obiara mmfir edzi mmfi nsa nnguan mmfi kurow yi mu nnkɔ nnkɛka no wɔ Jezreel."

column2: "Nna Jehu tsenaa tseaseanam mu sii mu kɔr Jezreel; osiandɛ hɔ na Joram da. Na Judahen Ahazia esian aba dɛ ɔrobɔhwɛ Joram."
"Afei ɔweɔmfo gyina Jezreel abantsentsen no do
column3: na ohun Jehu no kuw no dɛ ɔreba
column5: Muhu kuw bi. Na Joram see dɛ
column6: Fa ɔpɔnkɔdonyi soma no ma onkehyia hɔn

column2: "Nna obi tse ɔpɔnkɔ do sii mu kɔree kehyiaa no
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Asomdwee anaa? Na Jehu see dɛ
column6: Ebɛnadze na ɔwo nye asomdwee ewɔ yɛ? Dan woho kedzi m'ekyir. Na ɔweɔmfo no kaa dɛ

column2: "Nna ɔsomaa nyia otsia ebien so a ɔtse ɔpɔnkɔ do a okodur hɔn nkyɛn no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column5: Asomdwee anaa? Na Jehu see dɛ
column6: Ebɛnadze na ɔwo nye asomdwee ewɔ yɛ? Dan woho kedzi m'ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔweɔmfo no kaa dɛ
column3: Ɔno so ekodu hɔn nkyɛn
column4: naaso ɔannsan ammba; na hɛnka no tse dɛ Nimsi ne ba Jehu ne hɛnka; osiandɛ ɔka no abɔdam mu."

column2: "Na Joram see dɛ
column3: Hom nyɛ krado. Na wosiesiee ne tseaseanam. Na Israelhen Joram
column5: obiara wɔ noara ne tseaseanam mu
column6: na wofiir edzi dɛ worikehyia Jehu
column7: na wokohun no wɔ Jezreelnyi Nabot n'asaase no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Joram hun Jehu no
column5: Jehu
column8: dɛ wo na Jezebel n'ehuhubra na n'abayidze ayɛ pii yi a?"

column2: "Na Joram daan ne nsa
column3: na oguanee
column5: Ahazia e

column2: "Na Jehu dze n'ahoɔdzen nyina twee n'egyen mu towee bɔɔ Joram wɔ n'abasa ntamu
column3: na egyen menaba no hwiraa n'akoma mu puei

column2: "Nna Jehu see ne safohen Bidkar dɛ
column3: Ma no do
column4: na kɔtow no kyen Jezreelnyi Nabot ne haban mu asaase no do: na kaa aber a emi na ɔwo tse mpɔnkɔ do dzi n'egya Ahab ekyir no
column5: mbrɛ EWURADZE sii na ɔdze atsɛmbusɛm yi too no do

column2: "Ampa mehu Nabot no bɔgyaa
column3: na ne mba hɔn bɔgyaa ndeda ara
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse; na mebɛhyɛ wo ananmu wɔ asaasetɔw yi do
column5: EWURADZE na ɔse. Dɛm ntsi afei ma no do kɔtow no kyen asaasetɔw no do
column6: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm no tse."

column2: "Na aber a Judahen Ahazia hun iyi no
column3: ɔfaa Bɛt-hagan kwan do guanee. Na Jehu tsiiw no
column5: Wɔmbɔ ɔno so wɔ tseaseanam no mu: na wɔbɔɔ no Gur afowee a ɔwɔ Ibleam ho no. Na oguanee kɔr Megiddo

column2: "Na no nkowaa no dze no nam tseaseanam mu kɔr Jerusalɛm
column3: na wokesiee no wɔ n'asamandan mu kaa n'egyanom ho wɔ David kurow mu."

column2: "Na Ahab ne ba Joram n'afe a otsia dubiako no mu na Ahazia hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Juda do."
"Na aber a Jehu baa Jezreel no
column3: Jezebel tsee; na ɔkekaa n'enyiwa ho edur
column5: na ɔhwɛɛ tokura mu."

column2: "Na aber a Jehu hɛɛn kuropon no mu no
column3: nna ɔsee dɛ
column5: wo wura no kumfo?"

column2: "Na ɔmaa n'enyi do wɔ tokura no mu
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Woana na ɔwɔ m'afa? Woana a? Na asaa beenu anaa baasa fi hɔ hwɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom ntow no nkyen famu. Nna wɔtoow Jezebel kyeen famu: na no bɔgyaa no petsee fasu no
column4: na mpɔnkɔ no ho: na wɔdze anamɔn tsiatsiaa no do."

column2: "Na Jehu dur ahemfie no mu no
column3: odzidzii na ɔnomee; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Afei hom nkɔhwɛ ɔbaa a wɔapaa no no
column5: na wonsie no; osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔhen ne babaa."

column2: "Na wɔkɔr dɛ worikesie no: na woennhu no ho biribiara dɛ ne tsidwerba
column3: na n'anansa

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔsanee bae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ no. Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔnam n'akowaa Tisbinyi Elija do kae no nye yi
column5: Jezreel asaase do na nkraman bedzi Jezebel ne nam:"

column2: "na Jezebel no fun ayɛ dɛ efikyir wɔ haban enyi wɔ Jezreel asaase no do; amma wɔaannse dɛ
column3: Jezebel nye yi."
